constituent: drama, tiger, sow, pig, sword, sabre, saber
koohiiStory1: There would be a lot of drama if a tiger tried to eat a sow but then the sow attacked it with a saber.
koohiiStory2: A great Indian drama acted out every year is how a poor Bengali boy fended off the tigers from his pigs using only a sabre.
words:
喜劇(きげき): comedy, funny show
劇団(げきだん): troupe, theatrical company
演劇(えんげき): theatre play
劇(げき): performance, play
劇場(げきじょう): theatre
悲劇(ひげき): tragedy
